article.contentHtml: [{"id":"e881","type":1,"image":{"width":640,"height":61,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/2042271e10eb10250c200c75a9b212c5_640_61.gif","inline":false}},{"id":"40c7","type":0,"text":{"text":"米兰国际家具（上海）展览会将于2017年11月23-25日在上海展览中心举办。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":15,"end":29,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"5334","type":0,"text":{"text":"109家意大利顶级家具与室内设计品牌集体亮相中国市场。","linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"b74c","type":0,"text":{"text":"走进米兰之粹，共赴上海之约。","linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"70c8","type":0,"text":{"text":"点击文末“阅读原文”即可注册参观。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":17,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"6db2","type":1,"image":{"width":1280,"height":721,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/0e8d0104ed1fc174242b451791c80d55_1280_721.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"7175","type":0,"text":{"text":"距离米兰国际家具（上海）展览会开展仅剩1周！你马上就可以在家门口亲眼目睹这场设计界的“奥斯卡”。在为期三天的展期当中，我们将意大利的精华萃取到了上海展览中心。如果你已经对这场设计界的盛会迫不及待，不妨先看看我们为你准备的这份终极观展指南。"}},{"id":"5c56","type":0,"text":{"text":"109个意大利顶级品牌强势集结","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":15,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"4cb5","type":1,"image":{"width":800,"height":452,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/d58357697cda3b3e62752bc7549d56f8_800_452.gif","inline":false}},{"id":"0e03","type":0,"text":{"text":"第二届米兰国际家具（上海）展览会将于2017年11月23-25日在上海展览中心举办。109个意大利顶级家具品牌携手亮相中国市场，按照其不同的设计风格，本届展会参展品牌将分布于设计区、奢品区和设计区3大区域，展开3场风格穿越之旅。"}},{"id":"c320","type":1,"image":{"width":1200,"height":3887,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/5d4a35284d67e2448f2558908d15f319_1200_3887.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"9d72","type":0,"text":{"text":"设计区分布于上海展览中心东一馆的两个楼层，此区域的品牌将让您领会如何做到在表达美感的同时，更兼具产品的功能性。奢品区分布于上海展览中心西一馆的两个楼层，当奢华优雅被放到当代重新诠释便成为了一种介于经典和摩登设计之间的艺术演绎。经典区分布于上海展览中心西一馆的一楼，旨在呈现此区域的品牌无论历经多少时代，依旧保持迷人的魅力不减。它充分体现了传统手工艺的价值，以及家具制造领域的艺术。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":20,"width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"strong","start":55,"end":75,"width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"strong","start":113,"end":131,"width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"0aeb","type":1,"image":{"width":3002,"height":1689,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/81cdafcac1e24329ed3759ce8a079fd2_3002_1689.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"0ac9","type":0,"text":{"text":"Alessandro Colombo","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":18,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"163d","type":0,"text":{"text":"这位建筑大师把意大利搬运到了上海","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":16,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"8e2d","type":1,"image":{"width":548,"height":305,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/d329a6c881dc330160c23536f4ff0466_548_305.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"7f3f","type":0,"text":{"text":"Alessandro Colombo，Studio Cerri& Associati工作室联合创始人，米兰理工大学设计学院室内与展览设计硕士研究生导师，意大利展示设计组织IDEA董事会成员、多个品牌的艺术总监、多届Salone del Mobile海报的设计者。他与上海也颇有渊源——他曾经担任2010年上海世博会意大利馆的策展人和主设计师。这位大师将亲自负责Salone Shanghai的展会设计，和我们一起把意大利的精华一滴不漏的萃取到上海展览中心。"}},{"id":"7edd","type":0,"text":{"text":"IDEAT FUTURE FORUM","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":18,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"6b72","type":0,"text":{"text":"理想家未来论坛","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":7,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"00d5","type":0,"text":{"text":"手工，是人类将思维传达到指尖，依靠双手劳作，创造价值。科技，是人类将对于双手劳作的补充思维具像，从而更好地辅助双手劳作。可是，由于手工的劳作亘古不变，科技及科技衍生产品则日新月异，因此人们对于手工和科技的认知是不平等的，因为它们没有被放在同一个时间和空间下进行比较。"}},{"id":"fdb8","type":1,"image":{"width":1181,"height":1772,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/49df5c72c293092f3705ed2119450358_1181_1772.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"2aa5","type":0,"text":{"text":"11月25日，在2017米兰家具（上海）展览会现场，由全球领先的设计生活方式杂志《IDEAT理想家》主办的“IDEAT FUTURE FORUM理想家未来论坛”为此搭建了一个平等比较两者的平台，以“设计”作为纵向参照，并将时间定格在可预见的未来。我们看到和听到的将不再是灵巧的双手操纵着粗鄙简陋的工具，不再是华而不实的几何形状闪烁着奇怪的光芒。而是真正贴近人们生活的，触手可及的技艺。在文化、历史、艺术等迥异的大范畴中，“IDEAT FUTURE FORUM理想家未来论坛”试图探讨中国和意大利这两个文明古国能否由此出发，为未来设计领域的发展带来启迪。"}},{"id":"cc43","type":0,"text":{"text":"IDEAT Future Fortum理想家未来论坛力邀两位重量级对谈嘉宾：跨领域艺术家米丘和独立设计师、数字艺术家张周捷，就设计如何将手工与科技相融合进行探讨和思辨。同时，《IDEAT理想家》精心地准备了许多与这一议题相关的作品、资讯，并罗列了许多发人深思的问题，希望能达到抛砖引玉的效果，引发所有来宾的共鸣。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":38,"end":46,"width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"strong","start":47,"end":61,"width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"78c2","type":1,"image":{"width":794,"height":993,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/b3a8a805cb1e25ccd06ed59295bd4979_794_993.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"ab3a","type":1,"image":{"width":640,"height":42,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/0d5d54dc4280ae9e33f578f8d2f2bcef_640_42.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"a793","type":0,"text":{"text":"米丘10年旅欧对艺术的研修，被誉为中国第一代完全了解西方现代主义的艺术家。米丘的大量作品特别是他的行为、装置和大型环境作品都显示出跨世界、跨领域的对话意识。1996年回返中国，在上海成立“米丘现代艺术工作室”。同年获MOVADO文化艺术杰出贡献奖。对于艺术与科技多重结合性应用的思考，使其两年后提出“ArTech（艺术技术综合体）”概念。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":169,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"5742","type":1,"image":{"width":1280,"height":1919,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/1c2a4062d40933dab651f87d6889bf95_1280_1919.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"26ba","type":1,"image":{"width":640,"height":42,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/0d5d54dc4280ae9e33f578f8d2f2bcef_640_42.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"82ba","type":0,"text":{"text":"张周捷毕业于英国中央圣马丁艺术与设计学院，为英国建筑师协会访问研究员，自2010年创立张周捷数字实验室以来，一直是数字创作领域的先锋实践者。他的作品带有鲜明的独立性、实验性和未来性，探索数字形态的演化及制造。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":104,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"9cea","type":0,"text":{"text":"究竟，手工与科技，中国与意大利，米丘和张周捷之间会激发出怎样的火花，能否为中国当代与未来的设计指引一条成功之路，让我们共同期待“IDEAT FUTURE FORUM理想家未来论坛”的到来。"}},{"id":"ad43","type":0,"text":{"text":"展会现场精彩活动","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":8,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"3987","type":1,"image":{"width":1200,"height":2757,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/d4792ea83540ef6087b5041a61b7860c_1200_2757.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"52e6","type":0,"text":{"text":"来自意大利的知名媒体也将开展两场不容错过的设计对谈。《Domus国际中文版》和《Domus国际版》围绕“全新时代背景下青年设计一代的机遇与挑战”展开一次思想上的“探险”，探索未知的自己。"}},{"id":"2edf","type":1,"image":{"width":591,"height":354,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/2a2b85335d98cc255968a3be00368190_591_354.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"f903","type":1,"image":{"width":640,"height":42,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/0d5d54dc4280ae9e33f578f8d2f2bcef_640_42.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"2ee1","type":0,"text":{"text":"DOMUS邀请到的演讲嘉宾","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":13,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"753a","type":0,"text":{"text":"左起：Annalisa Scullica","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":52,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"1e39","type":0,"text":{"text":"50多位年轻设计师的作品入围了今年与展会同期同地举办的上海卫星展，比去年增加了12位。上海卫星展的颁奖典礼将于11月23日下午1点在意大利广场（上海展览中心-序馆）举办，届时家具与室内设计行业的专业观众们将齐聚一堂，共享属于中国新锐设计师们的荣光。"}},{"id":"08db","type":0,"text":{"text":"11月23日当天，2017 EDIDA国际设计大奖中国区获奖者也将在此地揭晓。究竟哪些诞生于中国设计师之手的绝妙设计会获奖？来现场亲眼见证吧！"}},{"id":"3788","type":1,"image":{"width":1025,"height":685,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/87cb4d36346343b5864e815cfc19dfb0_1025_685.gif","inline":false}},{"id":"7367","type":0,"text":{"text":"从视觉到舌尖的满满设计感","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":12,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"cf43","type":0,"text":{"text":"如果109个意大利顶尖家具品牌带来的视觉满足感和丰富现场活动带来的大脑刺激还不足以让你流连忘返，那么融化于唇齿间的满满设计感绝对能使你驻足停留。"}},{"id":"88f3","type":0,"text":{"text":"现场将会设有5个风格迥异的餐饮区域，分别由《安邸AD》、《美国室内设计》、Illy咖啡、圣培露以及意大利贸易促进委员会呈现。从家具到咖啡到甜品再到意式料理，这是一场从视觉到舌尖的饕餮盛宴。"}},{"id":"eccb","type":1,"image":{"width":1200,"height":605,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/7839ee84ba97a09c35890167e00c9887_1200_605.gif","inline":false}},{"id":"314e","type":0,"text":{"text":"全方位体验意式风情","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":9,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"1d3e","type":0,"text":{"text":"作为米兰国际家具（上海）展览会主赞助商，知名电商平台京东(JD.COM)将再次参与到本届展会，并将帮助意大利家具品牌更好地进入中国市场。此外阿尔法•罗密欧（Alfa Romeo）、意利（Illy）、圣培露（S.Pellegrino）等意大利顶级奢华汽车、餐饮品牌也对本届展会予以大力支持。","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":26,"end":36,"width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"strong","start":70,"end":116,"width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"f064","type":1,"image":{"width":705,"height":506,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/21c1d8b06775a923a5707f6d7f03210d_705_506.gif","inline":false}},{"id":"d015","type":0,"text":{"text":"来自顶配豪车的马达轰鸣、原汁原味的咖啡香气、纯净甘甜的天然泉水将齐聚一堂带您走近最真实的意大利并感受全世界的人们都热爱的意大利之美。"}},{"id":"6e83","type":1,"image":{"width":1084,"height":871,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/c56736166aa044ad5273d8cca8b06d55_1084_871.gif","inline":false}},{"id":"01fc","type":0,"text":{"text":"展会票价","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":4,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"big","align":"center"}},{"id":"9ccb","type":1,"image":{"width":558,"height":90,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/fd991a5420e12ed7b4b316cb3dddf178_558_90.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"9bda","type":0,"text":{"text":"在线预登记系统是所有观众注册参观的唯一通道","linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"cf82","type":0,"text":{"text":"点击文末“阅读原文”即可注册参观","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":5,"end":9,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"72ae","type":1,"image":{"width":366,"height":104,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/631ee52a9fe0444acc9913137785f994_366_104.png","inline":false}},{"id":"6172","type":0,"text":{"text":"米兰国际家具（上海）展览会","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":13,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"49b5","type":0,"text":{"text":"2017年11月23-25日","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":14,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"9c65","type":0,"text":{"text":"上海展览中心","markups":[{"tag":"strong","start":0,"end":6,"width":0,"height":0}],"linetype":"aside"}},{"id":"db72","type":0,"text":{"text":"Stay
